trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que pode ser arrastado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control can be included in another control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, to let the user change the control's value.
trans-unit.target: O controle Thumb pode ser incluído em um outro controle, como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle para permitir que o usuário altere o valor do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The Thumb can also be used to resize controls.
trans-unit.target: O Thumb também pode ser usado para redimensionar controles.

trans-unit.source: For example, a Thumb control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um controle Thumb no canto de uma janela pode fornecer um local para o usuário clicar com o mouse para iniciar uma operação de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Thumb provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece Pen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>arraste de eventos para gerenciar operações associadas com o ponteiro do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the left mouse button, the Thumb control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse, o controle Thumb recebe foco lógico e captura do mouse e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: While the Thumb control has focus and mouse capture, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event can be raised multiple times without limit.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o controle Thumb tem foco e mouse capturar, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem limite.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the left mouse button, the Thumb control loses mouse capture and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário libera o botão esquerdo do mouse, o controle Thumb perde a captura do mouse e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the Thumb.
trans-unit.target: As informações de evento fornece uma alteração na posição, mas não reposicionar o controle deslizante.

trans-unit.source: You must manually change or reposition the Thumb or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Manualmente, você deve alterar ou reposicionar o controle deslizante ou outros elementos que você deseja redimensionar ou alterar como resultado da operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: O controle Thumb não fornece funcionalidade de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: A Thumb control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Um controle Thumb pode receber a captura do mouse, mas não pode receber o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>que corresponde ao foco do teclado está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the parent class <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that sets this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor substitui a classe pai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>que define essa propriedade como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> events.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer a funcionalidade de arrastar, manipulação de classe é fornecida para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a Thumb is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the Thumb reflects the size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando um Thumb é parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle que percorre o conteúdo em uma área visível ou o visor, o tamanho do controle deslizante reflete o tamanho do visor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control that is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controle que faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## Customizing the Thumb Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Thumb controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de barra de rolagem](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ilustração da barra de rolagem") # # personalizando controle Thumb para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de Thumb, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Thumb, see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o Thumb, consulte [Syles Thumb e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle de botão e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a drag operation for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cancela uma operação de arrastar para a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tem foco lógico e captura do mouse, este método remove a captura do mouse e gera um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle perde a captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This DragCompleted event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento DragCompleted ocorre quando o botão esquerdo do mouse é liberado ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle recebe a captura do mouse quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse when the DragCompleted event occurs is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> of the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: A posição do mouse quando ocorre o evento DragCompleted é fornecida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>da última <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma ou mais vezes à medida que o mouse muda de posição quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle tem foco lógico e captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle recebe foco e mouse captura quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle perde a captura do mouse quando o usuário libera o botão esquerdo do mouse, ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: A new DragDelta event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um novo evento DragDelta ocorre sempre que a posição do mouse se move na tela.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, esse evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem um limite quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle tem captura do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control receives logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle recebe foco lógico e captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle recebe foco e mouse captura quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Roteadas informações de evento | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Estratégia de roteamento | Bolha | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle tem foco lógico e captura do mouse e o botão esquerdo do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: When the IsDragging property changes its value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade IsDragging altera seu valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o .NET Framework versão 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging tem um setter protegido.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Para usar essa funcionalidade, seu aplicativo deve ter como destino o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle tem foco e mouse capturar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> property.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>evento definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method gives the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, esse método oferece o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>foco lógico e captura do mouse e conjuntos de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>propriedade para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>evento definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method removes mouse capture from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, este método remove a captura do mouse do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event when the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tem foco lógico e captura do mouse, essa implementação dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento quando o mouse se move.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event is handled by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>evento é manipulado definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.
